      • getAvailableTimings

        public java.util.Map<java.time.LocalTime,​java.util.ArrayList<Table>> getAvailableTimings​(java.time.LocalDate date,
                                                                                               int numPax)
        Get all available timings given a Date and the Number of Pax Returns a HashMap with a timing as a key and an ArrayList of available tables at this time Filters out Tables have a reservation at that timing
        Parameters:
        date - Date of desired Reservation
        numPax - Number of Persons for the Reservation

      • getPossibleTimings

        public java.util.Map<java.time.LocalTime,​java.util.ArrayList<Table>> getPossibleTimings​(int numPax)
        Get all Possible Timings in 1 hour intervals from opening time to closing time Returns a HashMap with key of time and the value as an ArrayList of Tables Tables that do not have sufficient capacity to fit the number of pax will be filtered out
        Parameters:
        numPax - minimum capacity of Table needed
